titleStmt.title: Corante, or nevves from Italy, Germanie, Hungarie, Spaine and France. 1621

publicationStmt.publisher: By Broer Ionson, dwelling on the new side behinde Borchwall in the siluer Can, by the brewery,

notesStmt.note: In the copy which is found in Harl. MS. 389/87 there are many corrections of the poorly translated text in a contemporary hand--Cf. Dahl.
Identified as STC 5747 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the new side behinde Borchwall in the siluer Can
